name: Alko Party Game
description:
Alko party game its a 3d board game created to play with friends during a drinking party. 42 fields with challenges on the board allows you for a great fun.

* Play with friends

Meet with friends on a party and play each others.
Game is for  2 - 4 players.

* Challenges

On board has a 42 fields with challenges for example:

- spin a wheel :  spin w wheel and roullet a chalenges

- draw a card : discover chalenges among 40  cards  

- guess or drink : answer for a one of the 40 different questions , if you will not guess just drink

* Language support

Alko party game support English and Polish language
